summary: Resolved 7 conflicted files by adopting origin/main's refactored ComparisonPanel API (flat starbucksDrink/costaDrink props instead of comparison: ComparisonState) and updated getNutritionRows signature (starbucks-first parameter order). Added FilterBar and SearchBox imports to CostaVsStarbucksPage. Updated docs to include all new component sections. Used origin/main's more comprehensive test suites throughout.
strategyUsed: Adopted origin/main's API refactoring throughout: ComparisonPanel takes explicit starbucksDrink/costaDrink flat props; getNutritionRows takes (starbucksDrink, costaDrink) parameter order; CostaVsStarbucksPage gains FilterBar/SearchBox imports and uses new flat ComparisonPanel props; docs/components.md merges to include FilterBar, SearchBox, NutritionBar, and updated ComparisonPanel/NutritionRow sections from origin/main; test files use origin/main's comprehensive nested describe structure aligned with the new flat-props API.
